Title: On The Mend
Description: Now that you have won a battle, we need to heal up your pets so they can fight another day!  Visit Jaelysia, our local stable master, to heal and revive your pets.
ObjectivesText: Heal your pets to full health by visiting Jaelysia the Stable Master.
PortraitGiverText: Jaelysia, the local Stable Master, can heal and revive your pets.
